terminals.name: main
terminals.command: cd /workspace && echo 'Go Extras Development Environment Ready' && echo 'Tools available via Go 1.24+ tool directive and Bun' && echo 'Run: go tool task --list to see available tasks' && bash
terminals.description: Main development terminal for go-extras project

terminals.name: vscode-extension
terminals.command: cd /workspace/editors/vscode && echo 'VS Code Extension Development' && echo 'Available commands:' && echo '  bun run build     - Build extension' && echo '  bun run watch     - Watch mode' && echo '  bun run test      - Run tests' && echo '  bunx vsce pack    - Package extension' && echo '  bunx eslint .     - Lint TypeScript' && bash

terminals.name: go-tools
terminals.command: cd /workspace && echo 'Go Tools Development (via go tool <name>)' && echo 'Available tools:' && echo '  go tool task --list        - Show all tasks' && echo '  go tool dlv debug          - Debug with Delve' && echo '  go tool golangci-lint run  - Run linter' && echo '  go build ./...             - Build all packages' && bash
